Query: Visualize all oceans on the map.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'ocean';

Query: Show all seas on the map.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'sea';

Query: Highlight all gulfs and bays together.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla IN ('gulf', 'bay');

Query: Display all fjords and inlets with dashed borders.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla IN ('fjord', 'inlet');

Query: Map only straits and channels for navigation studies.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla IN ('strait', 'channel');

Query: Show all rivers.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'river';

Query: Visualize all lagoons globally.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'lagoon';

Query: Display marine areas labeled as 'reef'.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'reef';

Query: Map generic marine regions with low opacity.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'generic';

Query: Visualize all 'sound' features around continents.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'sound';

Query: Show the top 10 largest ocean features by area.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'ocean' ORDER BY ST_Area(geom) DESC LIMIT 10;

Query: Map all featurecla entries larger than 500,000 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE ST_Area(geom) > 5e11;

Query: Visualize all named 'Red Sea' marine features.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE name LIKE '%Red Sea%';

Query: Show the top 10 largest marine features by area.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys ORDER BY ST_Area(geom) DESC LIMIT 10;

Query: Map all marine features larger than 1,000,000 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE ST_Area(geom) > 1e12;

Query: Visualize only small bays under 10,000 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'bay' AND ST_Area(geom) < 1e10;

Query: Highlight large gulfs (area > 500,000 km²).
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'gulf' AND ST_Area(geom) > 5e11;

Query: Display oceans sorted by area from largest to smallest.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'ocean' ORDER BY ST_Area(geom) DESC;

Query: Compare total area of each marine feature type.
SQL: SELECT featurecla, SUM(ST_Area(geom))/1e6 AS total_area_km2 FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys GROUP BY featurecla ORDER BY total_area_km2 DESC;

Query: Show only reef and lagoon features below 5,000 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla IN ('reef', 'lagoon') AND ST_Area(geom) < 5e9;

Query: Visualize mid-sized sea features (10k–500k km²).
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'sea' AND ST_Area(geom) BETWEEN 1e10 AND 5e11;

Query: Map the smallest 20 marine regions by area.
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys ORDER BY ST_Area(geom) ASC LIMIT 20;

Query: Highlight all marine regions with area less than 100 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE ST_Area(geom) < 1e8;

Query: Visualize area distribution of all inlet regions.
SQL: SELECT name, ST_Area(geom)/1e6 AS area_km2 FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'inlet';

Query: Show only rivers larger than 1000 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE featurecla = 'river' AND ST_Area(geom) > 1e9;

Query: Map features whose area is between 100 and 500 km².
SQL: SELECT * FROM ne_10m_geography_marine_polys WHERE ST_Area(geom) BETWEEN 1e8 AND 5e8;
